answers.answer: When I had a biopsy they gave me a grade of inflammation and a stage of fibrosis.  I am assuming the fibrosure is the same.  You have HCV so it would be normal to have inflammation.The inflammation means your liver is inflamed however you have no damage yet so that is good.Take Care, Dee.

question: Fibrosis is 0 but have high inflammation normal is .17 mine is 48? Dr said everything is normal to me on 12 2.What is inflamed?  I specifically questioned him about keeping my kidneys safe in treatment as i have diabetes, HBLP ectera.
title: Fibrosure test
